original_text: But Ebed-Melek, a Cushite, an official in the royal palace, heard that they had put Jeremiah into the cistern. While the king was sitting in the Benjamin Gate,
korean_text: 왕궁 내시 구스인 에벳멜렉이 그들이 예레미야를 구덩이에 던져 넣었음을 들으니라 그 때에 왕이 베냐민 문에 앉았더니

sentences.original_text: But Ebed-Melek, a Cushite, an official in the royal palace,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 에벳-멜렉은, 구스 사람이며, 왕궁의 관원으로서,

sentences.original_text: heard that they had put Jeremiah into the cistern.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예레미야를 웅덩이에 넣었다는 것을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: While the king was sitting in the Benjamin Gate,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 베냐민 문에 앉아 있을 때,
